messages.message: On suggestion to make the validation rule simpler is to use a clean prompt to grab the field you want (e.g. pick out country). Then you would be able to use your original validation function. Does that option work for you?
It is definitely cleaner. Ideally, it would do the provenance as well, so I can see what row this data came from. But this works for now. Thanks @lydia!
Do you mean it's not showing you any provenance? Is it a reasoning field?
Not showing provenance. It is just extraction. Maybe it is a side effect of us showing the excel sheet?
It shows the provenance fine on all the PDFs
